A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It's as if the writers had never seen the Original Star Wars Trilogy. 

Luke Skywalker\, who saw good in Mr Evil Darth Vader\, gets a whiff of dark side in his best friend and twin sister's son\, his very nephew\, and attempted to kill him. Then went into seclusion like a coward. Then killed him off.

What a crappy conclusion for Luke Skywalker.


I was there opening day to see this film\, as well as many other Star Wars Films\, but this one has told me that "OLD" fans of Star Wars can F*** OFF by Disney.
